content:
Ingredients: Beetroot - One medium sized - Diced/ Grated Carrot ðŸ¥•Â - One - Diced/Grated Jugni/cucumber - One ðŸ¥’ - Diced/Grated Tomato - One - Diced Honey - 2 tb sp Lemon Juice - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • In vegetable juicer add diced/grated beetroot, carrot
  • Next add cucumber/jugni and tomato pieces
  • Transfer it into juice glass
  • Add honey and lemon juice
  • Mix them well
  • Fresh & healthy beetroot juice ready
  • Have it in mornings with empty stomach. It will give so many benefits to your health
